bug.short_desc: Another addition to the new i18n chapter

long_desc.thetext:
Vertical translation -------------------- Qooxdoo does not support vertical translation directly, but can easily be achieved. Example of a vertical translation is a list of countries where you want each country name to be translated in its own language, not all in one language.
Sverige Schweden England √çsland Norge
Solution: You would need to go through all the available languages, look-up the key you're interested in (e.g. "word"), and accumulate all possible translations in a custom data structure.
